articles.title: Minister Cancels China Asian Games Visit As Arunachal Players Denied Visa - NDTV
articles.description: India on Friday filed a formal protest against China's "deliberate and selective obstruction of sportspersons" after Beijing denied visas and accreditation to athletes from Arunachal Pradesh.

articles.title: Asia markets slide ahead of Bank of Japan rate decision - CNBC
articles.description: The BOJ is expected to hold rates at -0.1%, but investors will be watching if the bank shifts its stance on other parts of its monetary policy, like its yield curve control policy.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ukraine’s ‘Biggest Ever’ Storm Shadow Attack Fails Miserably As Russia Learns From Sep 13 Missile Strikes - EurAsian Times
